Posts.Content: May 31, 2012 11:23PM ScaredSingleMom wrote: Well, I had another mammo and ultrasound yesterday. My Dr says that I have a solid mass that needs to come out. He is sending me to a surgeon that specializes in this type of surgery. So, I am just playing the waiting game at this point. Thank you all for the words of encouragement! I so appreciate it. I am keeping all of you in my prayers!

Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2012 12:18AM ScaredSingleMom wrote: Yes, I think that is what they are doing. I really didn't hear a lot of what my dr said, I was too busy crying. Now, that the initial shock is over, I have tons of questions for him.
